congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Customs-Trade Partnership Against Terrorism Reauthorization Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 3551, amended, to amend the Security and Accountability for Every Port Act of 2006 to reauthorize the Customs-Trade Partnership Against Terrorism Program, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 402 yeas to 1 nay, Roll No. 569;
